Save tournament prompt: Do you want to save tournament?
Delete tournament prompt: Are you sure you want to delete tournament?
Delete round prompt: Are you sure you want to delete current round?
Delete player prompt: Are you sure you want to delete player {{ player }}?
Select color prompt: Select color for the first player:
Invalid file: Provided invalid file or file content is not a JSON object
Tournament entry missing: Application couldn't find tournament entry. It might have been corrupted or manually deleted from storage.
Nothing to save: Nothing to save: There is no tournament active.
Too few players: At least three players are required to start the next round.
Not filled results error: Cannot start new round. Not all pairings' results have been entered.
All rounds played error: All the rounds in the tournament have been played. Cannot start new round.
BbpPairings export error: Unable to generate input file for BbpPairings engine.
No valid pairings error: No valid pairing exists: The players could not be simultaneously matched while satisfying all absolute criteria.
Initialization error: Application has encountered an error while initializing BbpPairings engine. If the problem persists, please clear cache and restart the app.
No tournament active error: There is no tournament active. Cannot start new round.
Processing stopped error: Processing stopped due to multiple errors found
Matchmaking warning: <0>Warning: </0>Some settings might not be available after first pairing
No pairs: No pairings defined for selected round.
No players: No players defined in the tournament.
No games: No games played so far, nothing to display.
Number of rounds too low: Number of rounds must be positive
Number of rounds above 99: Number of rounds cannot exceed 99 rounds
Printing error: An error occurred while printing. Please try again.
Printing not supported: Your browser doesn't support printing (e.g. Firefox for Android). Please use compatible browser to print.
No tournament active: There is no tournament open right now. <2>Do you want to create one?</2>
About 1: {{ appName }} - simple chess tournament manager, written with Preact, TypeScript and a bit of C++.
About 2: It is a response for the already existing tournament managers. Some of them lack readability, many aren't cross-platform due to being a standalone desktop application. And most of them require registration.
About 3: {{ appName }} aims to fix all these issues while remaining as simple as possible. Doing what it should exactly do - managing a tournament and pairing players against each other. All from the browser, with offline capabilities.
About 4: Application is actively evolving. With time, it might gain more features to provide better overall experience!
About bbpPairings: <0>bbpPairings</0> - Swiss system pairing engine by Jeremy Bierema, licensed under Apache 2.0.
About Emscripten: <0>Emscripten</0> - a complete compiler toolchain to WebAssembly, using LLVM, with a special focus on speed, size, and the Web platform. Without it, integration with bbpPairings wouldn't be possible. Thanks a ton!
About icons: Chess icons created by Freepik - Flaticon
